sentence: The organization noted that all four leading candidates in the seven-way primary — Cleveland investment banker Mike Gibbons, former Ohio Treasurer Josh Mandel, former state Republican chair Jane Timken and Vance — scored 100% on the survey used to help determine their endorsement.
author: JULIE CARR SMYTH - Associated Press
title: Ohio Right to Life backs JD Vance for open US Senate seat
